examples.title: Results Summary Component
examples.subtitle: Frontend Mentor Solution
examples.description:
The challenge here was to create a Component that displays results of some kind.

This challenge was accomplished by the Mobile First approach, just as this portfolio was built on. In this challenge I also used a color map to store and select the colors of the results summary

examples.title: QR Code Component
examples.subtitle: Frontend Mentor Solution
examples.description:
This is just a simple container with an image and a description inside it, in the form of a QR Code.

This simple challenge was my first for Frontend Mentor. I chose to do this mostly to practice the site, also to practice a workflow.
